Token.Abstract: The PWLocationManagerDelegate protocol defines the methods used to receive location updates from a PWLocationManager object.
Tells the delegate that a new location update is available.

Parameter.Name: manager
Parameter.Abstract: The location manager object that generated the update event.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: A location object with the updated location information. This object conforms to the PWLocation protocol.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the location manager was unable to retrieve a location value.

Parameter.Name: manager
Parameter.Abstract: The location manager object that was unable to retrieve the location.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error object containing the reason the location could not be retrieved.
